title: 100% Aircraft 2 Full Face Helmet Lands, Loaded with Proprietary Tech
content:
THe new 100% Aircraft 2 full-face helmet has landed. The brand’s proprietary Smartshock Technology headlines the new entry, in conjunction with a patent-pending, injection-molded chin bar and multi-density EPS foam. The new release builds on 100%’s previous downhill/BMX Aircraft helmet. Here’s what we know so far. 100% Aircraft 2 Helmet Spec Sheet The feature list […]

The post 100% Aircraft 2 Full Face Helmet Lands, Loaded with Proprietary Tech appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Sam Anderson
